subject: Re: [junit] Using the Reflection API for private methods?   Package access?
msgSnippet: If everyone had *my* opinion, then it wouldn t get boring for a very long time... ... J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write
messageBody:
If everyone had *my* opinion, then it wouldn't get boring for a very long time...

>So said Vladimir R. Bossicard on 4/14/2003 --------------------
>> As usual, Vladimir provides the opposite opinion and makes it almost
>seem plausible. :)
>
>It would be boring if everyone had the same opinion, wouldn't it? :-)
>
>-Vladimir
